helpaddcr: Gives a specified amount of cr to a specified user. Syntax: !addcr <user> <cr>
helprmcr: Deletes a given amount of cr from a specified user. Systax: !rmuser <user> <cr>
helpgetcr: Displayes a specified users Községi Krajcár worth. Syntax: !getcr <user>
helpsetcr: Sets a given amount of cr to a specified user. Syntax: !crset <user> <cr>
helpchkuser: Checks if the specified user exists. Syntax: !checkuser <user>
userNotExistsLang: The specified user does not exist.
userAndCrNotEnteredEmbedLang: You must enter a user and a cr.
crSetEmbedLang: The specified user's Községi Krajcár worth has been set.
userAndFlagNotEnteredLang: You must specify a user and a flag.
